content.body: The recently introduced https://html.spec.whatwg.org/#focus-another-option seems to have a bug re _option_ vs _newOption_.
content.formatted_body: The recently introduced https://html.spec.whatwg.org/#focus-another-option seems to have a bug re option vs newOption.

content.body: Domenic: I added whatbot to https://github.com/whatwg/cookiestore but it doesn't surface on my PR. Is there a separate change to be made somewhere?
